titles.title: Providing for a technical correction in the enrollment of S. 21.

action.text: Mr. Thomas (CA) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: 10/6/1994 CR H11131)

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Senate to make a correction in the enrollment of S. 21 (designating certain lands in the California desert as wilderness and establishing the Death Valley, Joshua Tree, and Mojave National Parks).
